name: Adam Spry
text: First the food was fine and service was also. This review is the lack of respect of social distancing with rules they even have posted on their door.  Also I want others to be aware of this.  This afternoon, Initially we were seated in a ‚Ä¶More

name: Irene Puleo
text: Delicious food and great and pleasant service. Another great thing about this particular Mellow Mushroom is it they have characters made out of different metals and they had Bumblebee and Optimus Prime so the kids were thrilled

name: XtsaunO
text: My wife and I had a great experience. We received fast and efficient service, the food was delicious per usual and to top it off, we felt very safe. Everyone was wearing a mask and the staff made sure to sanitize everything. Overall, great experience. We will be returning!

name: Brina P.
text: Good food.  With Covid still in play lots of shaded outside seating with fans.  Dine in open.

name: Liz R
text: Anyone who knows me knows that I absolutely love mellow mushroom. It is my favorite place to eat. Whenever I have family or friends from out of town come to visit, I bring them to mellow and they love it! I even had my birthday party at ‚Ä¶More

name: Zach Jones
text: I love Mellow Mushroom, if you are in the South try it! I live in Ohio and they are few and far between. It's not the cheapest, but you get quality food with decent serving sizes. If you go try the artichoke dip, and the holy shiitaki pizza. Best dip and pizza I've ever had!!

name: Chris Kloth
text: I would give it less than 1 if I could.  I just picked up on an order made online which gave them 1 hr 15 minutes to cook and I still had to wait almost 30 minutes at the counter for them to make 2 pizzas.   What a joke.  Manager never ‚Ä¶More

name: David Schools
text: The controlled chaos that is the Mt Pleasant Mellow is amazingly efficient because of a staff that cares and knows what it is doing.  And... The pizza is perfect.

name: Rhonda ChefD Dunning
text: It was ok. They over loaded the pizza with cheese so it was soggy upon arrival to table. Our waitress seemed stressed and we didn't see her until she dropped food and check. Now in thier defense,  it was an early Saturday and it was a bit crowded. The kitchen staff was stressed! The place smells amazing though!

name: Heather Schafer
text: Food was amazing and they were so sweet and accommodating! We had a group of 30ish after playing baseball at the shipyard and the service was incredible!

name: Pieter Smits
text: Love their pizza. Great place for the family.

name: Zyne Scharite
text: I have Ordered from mellow mushroom several times and it‚Äôs always been good. Last night when I got my order the pizza was terrible. It was very rubbery. Could not eat it throw the whole pizza away.

name: Courtenay Brack
text: Good food, always. The Mt. P. location needs to get rid of the flies inside--2nd time we've been in recent months where we're swatting flies. Otherwise, they're on their game.

name: Joel Blackburn
text: More expensive than takeout/delivery pizza but cheaper than regular restaurant "pizzerias" and still taste just as good.

name: Jeff Sheridan
text: Great place to get a bite and watch some football.

name: American Artists Landscaping, Inc.
text: The best Mellow Mushroom location there is, hands down!! The staff from the door, to the servers, and most importantly, the cooks are the best here. Awesome job guys!!

name: Stephanie Hernan
text: So many choices that I never even heard of or imagined in my wildest dreams, but great tasting pizza for sure!!

name: Tim March
text: Just moved to the area. Being a vegan makes pizza tough. Just had the Veg Out tonight for dinner. Wow! Not only the best vegan pizza I've ever had, but one of the best pizzas too. Definitely got a repeat customer from me. Just wish the delivery was quicker, but good things are worth the wait!

name: Carol Curtis
text: Very cool place - loved the food & friendly service!

name: Carolyn Seitz
text: Fabulous food and atmosphere!! The salad is large, delicious, and filling. My daughters and I are vegan. They loved the vegan cheese on their pizza. The atmosphere is fun and inviting. We will definitely be going back.

name: Paula Show
text: Loved the ambiance, loved the food. Front staff could use a personality boost, especially when your spending $120 on as meal.

name: jason laing
text: Great service lovely food, being a vegan in the south its kinda hard to find places that are vegan friendly and Mello is one of my new hot spots.

name: St Vincent de Paul Household Furniture
text: We ordered pizza & salad, it was to be ready at 6:01. we got there on time, we called for curb put, they said a few minutes. They finally brought food to us at 6:25. ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephen Welk
text: The mushroom pie pizza is to die for...the truffle oil soars the flavour of the crust.

name: JoLynn Aponte
text: Mellow Mushroom is a great locally owned, family friendly restaurant!  Food is great and staff are very attentive! ‚Ä¶More

name: Kate Horsley
text: The food was great and our boys loved the Transformer Optimus Prime and Bumblebee in the outdoor seating

name: Irene Holland
text: Good service. Great lizza

name: Jasmine Keane
text: the pizza from this restaurant is so good that it‚Äôs the only thing that keeps me going during this ongoing nightmare of an existence, ESPECIALLY the vegan cheese

name: Kinser Jones
text: Great service and all staff adhering to mask policy

name: Bastian's Mom
text: It can be a challenge to find somewhere to eat with my sister and her girls. They love the vegan options at Mellow Mushroom! The food is amazing, service is great, and the atmosphere is fun! Highly recommended!

name: Nancy Tezza
text: Great pizza as always. Followed COVID guidelines but didn't take away from the great atmosphere. You never leave here hungry!

name: Brian Looper
text: Incredible service and the food was fantastic! You know how much you want pizza right now, plus the jerk tempeh sub is soooooo good...

name: Evan Pendergraft
text: Good quality food, vegan friendly. A bit pricey compared to some other places, but I hope that's because of the quality of ingredients.

name: Scott Shearer
text: Always good food and service at Mellow Mushroom. Every time we are on vacation we make a point to locate one.

name: Jonathan Dunagan
text: Very good pizza. We had the Magic Mystery Tour with sausage and it was spicy and delicious. The menu is a bit busy. They should also give an option to cut the slices smaller.

name: Beverly Thomas
text: The atmosphere is very retro and fun. The food was great and the staff very friendly.  If your visiting this area, check it out and their websites.

name: jason gorham
text:
DON"T GO if yo want to deal with kids who have not idea  about
customer service  or the manager that understands problems or how to resolve them Mellow Mushow should be applauded to this.  No JOKE don't go here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Katie Hendricks
text: We didn't stay to order, my child is in the process of potty training and had to go. Every one was in cdc regulations due to covid19, yet were still polite and ready to serve.

name: Sheila Stewart
text: The food was delicious! They also had a nice selection of adult beverages.  They even had popular bourbons on the menu.  Staff was very nice.

name: Vanessa Zanin
text: Dog friendly, kid friendly. Covered outdoor patio, fun games, great pizza and music. They also rock a great GF and DF pizza.

name: Wythe Crisler
text: Great pizza and great atmosphere. They actually ended up messing our order up, but they already knew it when they brought the pizza out and had a new extra pizza already started to fix the issue. Great customer service!

name: Brandi Barone
text: Amazing! So delicious! Thank you!

name: Nick Litten
text: Best pizzas in chucktown. Nuff said.

name: Jeff Tollison
text: 1st time ever going there and the pizza was ok, not great, and the service was slow. Took over 1hr 45mins after we got seated and had our order taken to get food. People around us that came in way after us got their food first.

name: Nicole Sheriff
text:
The atmosphere is great.
The food is great!
The beer beer is cold!. ‚Ä¶More

name: Laurie A Henderson
text: I loved the food and the service.  I like the name of each dish.

name: Gail Gamble
text: The pizza was good but the noise level was too much. This is not the place to go if you wang to relax.

name: Christopher Mulholland
text:
Awesome music and amazing staff! Open kitchen so you can see the guys tossing the dough...
Loaded potato pie is my fave!
Huge draft selection and awesome bar!

name: Gary Tucker
text: I ordered the all meat pizza had very little cheese and sauce. The meat on the pizza was over baked, taste like beef jerky. The service was good. Don't think I will be back.

name: Joseph P
text: Best spot for pizza! Customer service is awesome. We come about once a week and have always had wonderful food and service!

name: Consuelo Loftis

name: Josh Wurdemann

name: Kingman Hodgkiss

name: Pavan Surana
text: Always great service and always consistent delivery.  Even when ingredients change, they're able to deliver the same product and experience

name: David Dysart

text: Called in for a pizza to go.  Friendly staff,  greeted at the door,  pizza was almost ready.  Wait person kept checking for my order.  Pizza was delicious,  also ordered a calzone. Also delicious

text: Great pizza with the best crust. Lots of toppings and always fresh.

text: Honestly, one of the best calzones I've ever had!! Service was great, beer was cold with a great selection. Definitely be back soon!

name: Jessica Miller

name: Caroline Staley
text: We love their pizzas, salads and beer selections. Great place for the family. Very delicious and great cozy, warm atmosphere!

name: K BAY
text: The service was okay, just okay. Our waitress was a little snide and not unpleasant enough to complain but certainly not very welcoming. The steak calzone was very bland.

name: Kenneth Stanfield
text: The mushrooms were not mellow, they were awesomely awesome. It's always a pleasant surprise when your traveling and come across a gem you weren't looking for. This place is quirky and unique. The food is always a treat that makes you glad to be alive. So don't miss out. You'll kick yourself in the morning and that's hard to do.

name: Jonathan Snipe
text: Great place with solid pizza. It has a good craft beer selection. Great happy hour prices on drinks. Very chill atmosphere. Gluten free options for pizza.

name: Jacob Rivera
text: Different,fun good pizza...One Love‚úåüáØüá≤

name: Cathy Norris
text: Good pizza and salads

name: Legacy Painting
text: The best place for pizza in the area! So close to where I live too! If you want a great Buffalo chicken pizza this is the place!

name: Isaac
text: Restaurant is awesome. Bar staff is always wonderful. Gotta make it to trivia on Tuesdays!

name: Jon Myers
text: Great Atmosphere and Awesome hosts

name: James Bradley
text: Exceptional house salad and huge size. Had the cheese steak sandwich which was only okay. Instead of having the cheese melted throughout the beef steak filling it was plopped on top of the meat. The chopped beef quality was fine as they use ‚Ä¶More

name: Catherine Wible
text: So cute, with the robot theme! Best one I  have seen so far. Pizza was fantastic as always, waitstaff was efficient, friendly, and helpful.  Definitely going back to this one. Can't wait to bring the grandchildren!

name: Mandy Mortality [PTK!]
text: I have to say their gluten free pizzas are pretty great!

name: Ian Smith
text: Decent food, although I always expect it to taste better than it is. They try too hard with some of the fancy toppings. Service was so/so at this location on way to vacation. Watching tennis on their TV was the highlight.

name: Heather S
text: I loved everything about the Mellow Mushroom. The chef salad was awesome and I can't wait to have another slice of their pizza!!!

name: Darryl M
text: What else can you say?? The pizza rocks, the beer selection is huge, and the wait staff is polite, knowledgeable and helpful. Also the wait for food is short!

name: Michael Wilson
text: Jeez Louiz this place is the bees knees

text: Great service, awesome pizza!

name: David Haines
text: It's the mellow.

name: Rob Lebby
text: Service was good, pizza was ok. We were a large group and the wait person did a good job.

name: Eric Pettis
text: Mellow Mushroom is da bomb!

text: When there was a mess up in my order, the manager bought me a beer, fixed the error and got it out in a speedy way despite a packed house. Nice people and yummy pizza!

name: C M

name: Teressa Gamble
text: Love it! Except when busy  hours.

name: Darrell Hayes

name: Beth Toole
text: Go at least 3 times a month  . love the pizza but the bar was disappointing. A male   bartender knows how to pour but a female person stepped in and did not.  Did complain and gave a drink back but but was still charged for drink.

name: Whitney Knodel
text: I took my friend that came into town here for lunch. It was amazing. We ate pizza, calzones and a meatball sub. Everything was delicious. The service was outstanding. We even got a list of great ideas of things to do when he is here. I felt like I was eatting somewhere local, which is always the best. Definitely will be back for more.

name: Jim R
text: Ford was great, our server, Tess, was also very good! Our greeter, however, seemed irritated when asked to accommodate us with two small children; otherwise a nice time with great food!! We will be back!

name: Jeremy Kitchens
text: Their food is always on point. We're particularly fond of their house special pizza and the Greek salad. Make sure you bring your appetite as the house special is hefty! We usually sit at the bar but did a table last night and the service ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Macgregor
text: Had the most delicious pizza last night. The to go staff were obviously really busy but were super friendly and efficient. They checked my order and everything was perfect. Wonderful experience.

name: Natisha Somerville
text: Pizza was great. We were charged for ranch dressing but wasn't told there was a charge. Purchased a tea and white stuff was floating in BOTH cups...asked for another after the first but still had it in it.

name: Casey
text: The pizza was okay and the staff was overwhelmed. The prices were high for an average pizza. Went during the week for dinner and had to wait a long time in between being helped. Probably not going back any time soon.

name: Theresa Morgan
text: Wonderful server, great service, delicious food!!

name: Phil King
text: Booth pizzas and the cheese bread we had were great. We had the house special and the BBQ chicken.

name: Jack Lee
text: Excellent pizza but a little costly

name: christie lyons
text: Great service & pizza was wonderful.

name: modelcarguy55
text: The service was on the slow side, but the pizza was great! I had a large pie with pepperoni, sausage, ham and bacon. It was great! Brought some home for later enjoyment. The waitres was friendly. Very family friendly restaurant.

name: Melianne Lussier
text: Food is always consistently good, prices are a bit high but staff is always super friendly.

name: Emily Herkert
text: Great pizza and excellent service!

name: Erica Beckert
text: My husband and I absolutely love this place! The food is always great and service never disappoints! It‚Äôs also right next to our neighborhood and is a great place to bring family/friends/groups. You must try the Great White Pizza and the Greek Salad!!! Yum!

name: Anita Fillman
text:
Very good food
Interesting place.

name: Rick Clayton
text:
Came in with group of 10 and had just a moderate wait for seating.
Area we sat was at a long table with bar stools.
Very clean table and quick service but again not the most comfortable seating. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joel Kuhn
text: Went twice last week with the entire family.  Everyone was happy with their food and people all got different things, from subs to calzones to pizza to salads.  I think the Great White was the best, with the calzone running a short second. ‚Ä¶More

text:
A bit pricey, but all in all Ive found it worth it.

text: Their Pizza is consistently always delicious if not a little sweet because they butter the crust. But, I typically get a salad while the kids eat the pizza and their salads are Hardy and robust. Convenient location and friendly staff and a fully stocked bar. But remember, you have to be a Philadelphia sports fan!!!!

name: Delanie Michaud
text:
Great staff. Very LONG wait for food.
Food tastes great but WAY over priced!!

name: Kenneth Bingham
text: Kudos to MM for staying open during the storm!  Pizza was good as always and love the varieties of beer on tap.  Thanks again guys... We really appreciate you being there for the community.

text: This is the best location I've ever dealt with. Quick delivery. Excellent service when at the location. They always get the order right and go above and beyond.

name: Del Shaffer
text: We brought our friends from England so they could experience it.  We waited a while for a booth and waited a good while for our appetizer.  Our pizza was terrific but the worst part was that our kid had to wait on her food after we all got ours.  Will try again soon.

name: Jeff Squires
text: BBQ chicken pizza is ridiculously amazing

text: Really liked the flavor of the pizza. GF crust was good. Only 10in though.

text: The only thing good about this place is the food. We have waited over an hour  and still haven‚Äôt gotten our food. Very disappointing.

name: John Pennell
text: Such a good experience. My friends and I were there on a super busy night. The staff was friendly and efficient. Good selection of beers on draft and the food was great. Highly recommend.

name: Michael Horton
text: Always tastes the same, no matter what location you visit. It's a different kind of pizza experience, but that doesn't mean it's always great.

text: Great food, great service, reasonable prices, and fun for the whole family.

name: Frances Fernald

name: Kat B
text: Great food, great service, great atmosphere. Over all it a great place. Only thing is that it a little pricey. Fortunately I wasn't the one paying. But I saw the bill..it was a lot.

name: Jessi D
text: Great food and service!

name: Carolyn Frye
text: Great pizzas and service.

name: Bob markisello
text: Very inexpensive lunch with salad and good pizza.

name: Awendaw Red
text: Great pizza and more. Neighborhood  hangout. Good service. The food is really good. Atmosphere is kool. And clean.

name: Chris Hatfield
text: Very prompt service, laid back environment, crust is so good. They have some of the best beer on draft this side of the cooper river. Delivery is always fast .

text: Simply impeccable. Crunchy crust where it needs to be. Ooooey gooey cheesey just like it should be. Many options. Excellent apps and superior staff and management.  Never had a bad experience there and the live music is super cool! 5 big stars!

text: I'm totally hooked on the Greek salad, the Mighty Meaty pizza, wine and staff.  I've only had their take out puzza until this week. ...I've been here 3x this week.   Thanks Stephen for the great service.

name: Melody Mazurek
text: Food is always delicious, a great value for price. Service is superb always  greeted with warm  smiles and staff is knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Ryan VanMiddlesworth
text: This is easily my favorite pizza place when I'm not wanting New York style pizza. If you like exotic, high quality ingredients like Shiitake mushrooms,  BBQ chicken, or pesto base; this is the best place I've found in the South. Or if you just want a ridiculously good "normal" pizza, the House Special is phenomenal.

name: Ryan Angell
text: One of my least favorite pizza places. Takes waaaaaaaaaaaaaaay too long to get your food. They mention it on the menu but having worked in many pizza joints in my day, these pies are too doughy and take too long. ‚Ä¶More

text: Good but expensive.  $18 small pizza, but plenty to eat.

name: steve P

text: Always love eating here, would highly recommend

name: Aleks Radic
text: The only thing they had going for them, the gluten free pizza, they've now ruined. They reduced the size of the pie to 10 in. but are still charging the same price. Paying $40 for 2 personal pizzas and an app is absurd. If you like good pizza at a fair price, don't go here.

text:
Great Pizza with unlimited choices to make anyones perfect pizza.
